name: shipshipship
description: ShipShipShip is a self-hosted deployment dashboard for managing and tracking releases across environments. It helps teams visualize deployments and versions with a simple, opinionated release UI.

features.title: Deployment Tracking
features.description: Visualizes which versions are deployed across environments

features.title: Release Timeline
features.description: Displays deployment history with timestamps and version numbers

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Shows version differences between dev, staging, and production

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Alerts team members when new deployments occur

features.title: Rollback Tracking
features.description: Records rollback events and reasons for audit purposes

features.title: Service Grouping
features.description: Organizes multiple services and microservices in unified view

features.title: Version Badges
features.description: Generates embeddable badges showing current deployment status

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connects with CI/CD pipelines to auto-update deployment status
